abilities.name: OL45
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage, ignoring armor. Headshot: inflict 1 vulnerable

upgrades.name: Brace
upgrades.description: While in cover, attacks gain +1 max range and push 1 on hit.

upgrades.name: Tactical Reload
upgrades.description: Gain Headshot: reload and gain 1 strength

upgrades.name: Scavenge Ammo
upgrades.description: May consume one adjacent corpse before or after ACTing to reload and gain 1 strength.
